column1: Penni were one of the only six tribes of the Avari mentioned. They merged with the Silvan Elves of the Vales of Anduin.
It is suggested that the Penni belonged initially to the Nelyar
column2: and the shift of PQ kw to p had already occurred among the Lindar the Sundering of the Elves.

column1: penni is an Avarin word meaning "the People". It derives from Primitive Quendian kwende.
